seo_keywords: Roomba j7 side brush not spinning

problems.title: Not Emptying / Red Light on Base
problems.description: The robot docks but does not empty the bin, or the base shows a red light.
possible_causes: Clog in the base evacuation tube
solution_steps: Check if the bag in the Clean Base is full. Replace it (do not reuse).
Check the bottom of the Clean Base for clogs in the clear tube.
Ensure the robot's dust bin lid is fully closed.

problems.title: Edge Sweeping Brush Not Spinning
problems.description: The side brush stopped turning, leaving debris in corners.
solution_steps: Unscrew the side brush and remove hair.
If the brush is bent or missing bristles, install a new one.
If a clean brush still won't spin, the module needs replacement.
